item.title: Install Nextstrain by Conda
item.description: This is a note of install Nextstrain-cli by conda.

item.title: Install conda compiler tools
item.description: Conda is quite convenient for non-root users to install softwares in Linux system. But sometimes there is no packages available in anaconda repository and we have to install these softwares from source. This post introduces the way to compile and install softwares from source, use the Kyoto Cabinet Perl module as an example.
